allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix\(web\): resolve lint errors and improve type safety across dashboard and hooks

Fix ESLint no-explicit-any violations, remove unused variables, tighten type
casts in flux-logic, useFluxSync, and UI components for cleaner builds.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
